content: लोहित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (लोहिता|लोहिनी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [रुह्-इतच् रस्य लः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Red, redcoloured; स्रस्तांसावतिमात्रलोहिततलौ बाहू घटोत्क्षेपणात् <ls>Ś. 1. 30</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 29</ls>; मुहुश्चलत्पल्लवलोहिनीभिरुच्चैःशिखाभिः शिखिनोवलीढाः <ls>Ki. 16. 53.</ls> {@--2@} Copper, made of copper. --तः {@--1@} The red colour. {@--2@} The planet Mars. {@--3@} A serpent. {@--4@} A kind of deer. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Brahmaputra. {@--6@} A kind of rice. --ता <ab>N.</ab> of one of the seven tongues of fire. --तं {@--1@} Copper. {@--2@} Blood; <ls>Ms. 8. 284.</ls> {@--3@} Saffron. {@--4@} Battle. {@--5@} Red sanders. {@--6@} A kind of sandal. {@--7@} An imperfect form of a rainbow. {@--8@} A kind of agallochum.
लोहिनी A woman with a red-coloured skin.
